resources.string: A new time-lapse setting has been added.
Or choose a preset rate below
Frame-rate cannot be changed on an active time-lapse.
0.5 - Driving time-lapse, creepy crawlies, surfer on a wave, any sports
2 - Fast moving clouds, crowds of people, rush hour traffic, people walking along the street
5 - Clouds moving normally, sunrise or sunset
10 - Slow moving clouds, sunrise, sunset, waves on the beach
30 - Path of the sun on a clear day, moving shadows, night landscapes, stars and the moon
60 - Moving plants and trees, construction site over a day
